mapper.select: WITH A AS ( SELECT M.member_userid, NVL(L.day_leave_cnt, 0) AS day_leave_cnt, M.member_yeoncha FROM tbl_member M LEFT JOIN tbl_draft D ON M.member_userid = D.fk_member_userid AND D.draft_status = '승인완료' LEFT JOIN tbl_day_leave L ON D.draft_no = L.fk_draft_no ), B AS ( SELECT member_userid, COUNT(CASE WHEN work_startstatus = 0 OR work_endstatus = 0 THEN 1 END) AS click, COUNT(CASE WHEN work_startstatus = 1 THEN 1 END) AS late, COUNT(CASE WHEN work_endstatus = 1 THEN 1 END) AS leave, COUNT(CASE WHEN work_startstatus = 2 OR work_endstatus = 2 THEN 1 END) AS absent, ( COUNT(CASE WHEN work_startstatus = 1 THEN 1 END) + COUNT(CASE WHEN work_endstatus = 1 THEN 1 END) + COUNT(CASE WHEN work_startstatus = 2 OR work_endstatus = 2 THEN 1 END) ) AS total_count FROM tbl_work W JOIN tbl_member M ON W.fk_member_userid = M.member_userid GROUP BY M.member_userid ) SELECT B.click, B.late, B.leave, B.absent, B.total_count, COALESCE(SUM(A.day_leave_cnt), 0) AS day_leave_cnt, a.member_yeoncha FROM A JOIN B ON A.member_userid = B.member_userid WHERE A.member_userid = #{member_userid} GROUP BY B.click, B.late, B.leave, B.absent, B.total_count, A.member_userid, a.member_yeoncha

and lower(m.member_userid) like '%' || lower(#{searchWord}) || '%'

SELECT * FROM ( SELECT ROW_NUMBER() OVER (ORDER BY work_recorddate DESC) AS rno, to_char(work_recorddate, 'yyyy-mm-dd') AS work_recorddate, to_char(work_starttime, 'hh24:mi:ss') AS work_starttime, work_startstatus, to_char(work_endtime, 'hh24:mi:ss') AS work_endtime, work_endstatus FROM ( SELECT DISTINCT a.work_recorddate, a.work_starttime, a.work_startstatus, a.work_endtime, a.work_endstatus FROM tbl_work a JOIN tbl_member b ON a.fk_member_userid = b.member_userid WHERE a.fk_member_userid = #{member_userid}
and lower(m.member_userid) like '%' || lower(#{searchWord}) || '%'
and lower(m.member_name) like '%' || lower(#{searchWord}) || '%'
AND a.work_endstatus IS NOT NULL ) distinct_work_records ORDER BY work_recorddate DESC ) numbered_results WHERE rno BETWEEN to_number(#{startRno}) AND to_number(#{endRno})
